description: This Men's Merino Hemp Blend Short Sleeve Henley is designed so you can have that peaceful, easy feeling while you go about your day. Sharp enough to wear any time you're out, this two-button top is versatile enough for warm-weather hikes as well as jaunts around town. And if you’re worried about the heat, don’t sweat it: the Merino wool will help keep your body regulated. Don this Henley for a rockin’ and stylin’ great day.
name: Smartwool Merino Hemp Blend SS Henley - Mens
